article_title: Cleary faces uphill climb to unseat Holding in U.S. House District 13
article_text: Brenda Cleary, the Democratic challenger in the 13th District, says U.S. Rep. George Holding is too extreme on Affordable Care Act and Medicare. The Raleigh Republican focused on reducing national debt and tax overhaul.

article_metadata.news-keywords: George Holding, Brenda Cleary, Congressional District 13, U.S. House, Paul Ryan budget, Cary, Raleigh, redistricting, North Carolina politics, ncpol
